title: Club Social Parque, the Buenos Aires footballing academy which boasts more superstar graduates than Barcelona’s famous La Masia
text:
EFL next messi Club Social Parque, the Buenos Aires footballing academy which boasts more superstar graduates than Barcelona’s famous La Masia 
Club Social Parque claims famous graduates such as Diego Maradona and Carlos Tevez, and today's kids want to be the next Lionel Messi Pictured 22nd March 2017, 3:29 pm Updated: 22nd March 2017, 11:24 pm
